name: Pirate Quest (artoramen, JonHuang2000, ellisleo)
description:
Designer, Programmer - Jonathan Huang

Designer, Writer, Composer - Asad Ellis

Designer, Programmer, Main Artist - Kari Tran

Designer, Writer, Artist - Christopher Soong

STORY

Play as Pete, a young swashbuckler seeking glory in the harsh and competitive world of skullduggery. After seeing a bounty posted for a sick and revered beast, they embark on a quest for fame and fortune, scavenging for clues about the beast's location. After stumbling through ancient ruins and encountering a mysterious companion, Pete sees the beast is none other than Kojo, the blessed pirate ruler of the skies! 

Do you have the heart to take on his divine might? Or are you too lily-livered to rise up to the challenge?   

GAMEPLAY

  • Use your musket and cutlass to take down any enemies in your way! Give no quarter!
  • Dash around from platform to platform to evade incoming attacks
  • Scour a mysterious temple for cursed coins to break down Kojo’s defenses
  • Face off in an epic boss battle against Kojo, facing the full wrath of his power

FEATURES

  • Cute 2D art style
  • Puzzles and Platforming
  • Unique and Varied Music Tracks
  • Engaging Story
  • Intense Combat
